descriptionHtml:
This mod is also available on Steam Workshop, Here\'s a link http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=947058

This Mod increases the health value of the very final boss fight of the main quest, if you mix this mod with the \"Deadly Dragons\" mod the fight will become even more interesting. here\'s a link http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3829

Installation:
Simply download it with NMM.

Bugs:
Report them if you find any.

Permissions:
If you want to use assets from my mod on your own mods then ask me for permission first.

Credits:
Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK.
author: RxMonste
